articles.title: Students walk out of Harvard College graduation; UCLA contends with new protest - NBC News
articles.description: The end of encampments at some American college campuses this spring was not the end of pro-Palestinian protests at Harvard and UCLA.
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES  The end of encampments at some American college campuses this spring was not the end of pro-Palestinian protests at Harvard and UCLA.
